evidence_example.title: Demo Fatfs on the SD Card memory
evidence_example.small_descr: This demo provides an example on how to implement a FatFs on a SD Card memory.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This is a demo that shows how to implement a Fatfs on a SD Card memory. It also redirects the output of printf on the UART to show what the demo is doing. Use an hyperterminal to read the printf output. Connect the board to your PC by a null-modem cable.

This demo has been tested with the following hardware platform:
  • STM32F4DISCOVERY board.
  • STM32F4DIS-BB for the Base Board.
  • A 2GB SD card (SanDisck or Kingston). It should be formatted before using.
